title: React Appwrite Blogging Platform
features: Architected a responsive React-based blogging platform integrating Appwrite for secure authentication, real-time data sync, and scalable storage, boosting user engagement by 35%.
Implemented custom rich text editor and dynamic post cards using hooks and context API, reducing component load time by 20% and enhancing developer productivity.
Orchestrated end-to-end CI/CD pipeline with automated linting, unit tests, and deployment scripts, ensuring 99.9% uptime and rapid feature rollouts.
